member.name: T:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType
member.summary: Represents various types of notices that can be received from Twitch

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Unknown
member.summary: The default enum value for a notice

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Emote_only_on
member.summary: Indicates that "Emote Only" mode has been enabled.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Emote_only_off
member.summary: Indicates that "Emote Only" mode has been disabled.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Followers_on
member.summary:
Indicates that "Followers Only" mode has been enabled.
Note: Unlike , this notice is given when a user needs to be following for X amount of minutes

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Followers_on_zero
member.summary: Indicates that "Followers Only" mode has been enabled.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Followers_off
member.summary: Indicates that "Followers Only" mode has been disabled.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Subs_on
member.summary: Indicates that "Subs Only" mode has been enabled.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Subs_off
member.summary: Indicates that "Subs Only" mode has been disabled.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.R9K_on
member.summary: Indicates that "Unique" mode has been enabled.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.R9K_off
member.summary: Indicates that "Unique" mode has been disabled.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Slow_on
member.summary: Indicates that "Slow" mode has been enabled.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Slow_off
member.summary: Indicates that "Slow" mode has been disabled.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Cmds_available
member.summary: The response to a "/help" message.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Msg_channel_suspended
member.summary: Indicates that you have tried joining a suspended channel.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Msg_duplicate
member.summary:
Indicates that you have tried sending a duplicate message.
"Your message is identical to the one you sent within the last 30 seconds."

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Msg_emoteonly
member.summary: Indicates that "Emote Only" mode has been enabled.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Msg_followersonly_zero
member.summary: Indicates that your message was not sent due to "Followers Only" mode restrictions.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Msg_followersonly
member.summary: Indicates that your message was not sent due to "Followers Only" mode restrictions.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Msg_rejected_mandatory
member.summary: Indicates that your message was not sent because it conflicts with the channel's moderation settings.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Msg_R9K
member.summary: Indicates that you tried sending a non-unique message in "Unique" mode.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Msg_slowmode
member.summary: Indicates that you have not waited long enough between your messages to comply with "Slow" mode

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Msg_subsonly
member.summary: Indicates that your message was not sent due to "Subs Only" mode restrictions.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Msg_timedout
member.summary: Indicates that your message was not sent because you are timed out.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Msg_banned
member.summary: Indicates that you have been banned from the channel.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Msg_requires_verified_phone_number
member.summary: Indicates that your message was not sent because the channel requires verification through a phone number.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Msg_ratelimit
member.summary: Indicates that your message was not sent because you are sending messages too quickly.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Msg_suspended
member.summary: Indicates that your account has been suspended.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Msg_verified_email
member.summary: Indicates that your message was not sent because the channel requires verification through an email.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.No_permission
member.summary: Indicates that you tried using a command that you have no permission for.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Unavailable_command
member.summary: Indicates that you tried using a command that is not available through 3rd party clients.

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Unrecognized_cmd
member.summary: Indicates that you tried using a command that does not exist

member.name: F:MiniTwitch.Irc.Enums.NoticeType.Bad_auth
member.summary: Indicates that your authentication process was unsuccessful

member.name: T:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.IGiftSubNotice
member.summary: Contains information about a single gifted subscription

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.IGiftSubNotice.SystemMessage
member.summary:
The message emitted in chat when the user gifted the subscription
Example: Goop_456789 gifted a Tier 1 sub to Zackpanjang! They have given 11 Gift Subs in the channel!

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.IGiftSubNotice.Recipient
member.summary: The recipient of the gift subscription

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.IGiftSubNotice.SubPlanName
member.summary:
Name of the subscription plan
Example 1: Channel Subscription (mandeow)
Example 2: Channel Subscription (forsenlol)

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.IGiftSubNotice.Months
member.summary: The cumulative amount of months the recipient has been subscribed

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.IGiftSubNotice.GiftedMonths
member.summary: The amount of months the recipient received in the gift subscription

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.IGiftSubNotice.TotalGiftCount
member.summary: Total amount of the gifts the author has given

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.IGiftSubNotice.SubPlan
member.summary: The tier of the gift subscription

member.name: T:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.IGiftSubNoticeIntro
member.summary: contains information about a user who is about to gift one or more subscriptions to the community

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.IGiftSubNoticeIntro.SystemMessage
member.summary:
The message emitted in chat when the event occurs
Example: xHypnoticPowerx is gifting 25 Tier 1 Subs to Mande's community! They've gifted a total of 62 in the channel!

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.IGiftSubNoticeIntro.GiftCount
member.summary: The amount of subscriptions the author is gifting

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.IGiftSubNoticeIntro.TotalGiftCount
member.summary: Total amount of the gifts the author has given

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.IGiftSubNoticeIntro.SubPlan
member.summary: The tier of the gift subscriptions

The amount of outgoing JOINs allowed in a 10 second time period

Twitch docs:

member.summary:
Logging destination
Adding a logger is not required, but highly recommended

member.summary:
The message emitted in chat when the event occurs
Example: special_forces_of_russia is continuing the Gift Sub they got from potnayakatka64!

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.IPaidUpgradeNotice.GifterUsername
member.summary:
Username of the previous subscription's gifter
Note: Value is if the previous subscription's gifter was anonymous

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.IPaidUpgradeNotice.GifterDisplayName
member.summary:
Display name of the previous subscription's gifter
Note: Value is if the previous subscription's gifter was anonymous

member.name: T:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.ISubNotice
member.summary: Represents a user subscription

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.ISubNotice.Emotes
member.summary:
Emote sets in the resubscription message
if there are none, or if the user is a first time sub

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.ISubNotice.Flags
member.summary:
Automod flags in the resubscription message
if there are none, or if the user is a first time sub

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.ISubNotice.SystemMessage
member.summary:
The message emitted in chat when the event occurs
Example 1: SleepyHeadszZ subscribed at Tier 1.
Example 2: Syn993 subscribed at Tier 1. They've subscribed for 5 months, currently on a 4 month streak!

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.ISubNotice.CumulativeMonths
member.summary: Cumulative amount of months the user has been subscribed

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.ISubNotice.ShouldShareStreak
member.summary: Whether the user shared their month streak in the subscription message or not

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.ISubNotice.MonthStreak
member.summary:
How many months in a row the user has been subscribed
Note: Always 0 if is

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.ISubNotice.SubPlan
member.summary: The tier of the subscription

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.ISubNotice.SubPlanName
member.summary:
Name of the subscription plan
Example 1: Channel Subscription (mandeow)
Example 2: Channel Subscription (forsenlol)

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Interfaces.ISubNotice.Message
member.summary:
The user's resubscription message content
Note 1: Always for first time subscribers
Note 2: May be even for resubscriptions

member.name: T:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient
member.summary: Responsible for all communication with Twitch IRC. Parses and invokes events for IRC messages

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient.JoinedChannels
member.summary:
List of the currently joined channels
Note: The client will attempt to rejoin all channels upon reconnection

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient.ReconnectionDelay
member.summary: Time to wait before attempting to reconnect to TMI upon disconnection

member.name: E:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient.OnConnect
member.summary:
Invoked upon connecting to TMI
Note: This is only invoked once. Following connections to TMI will invoke

member.name: E:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient.OnReconnect
member.summary: Invoked upon reconnecting to TMI

member.name: E:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient.OnDisconnect
member.summary: Invoked upon disconnection from TMI

member.name: E:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient.OnMessage
member.summary: Invoked when a message is received

member.name: E:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient.OnGiftedSubNoticeIntro
member.summary:
Invoked when a user is about to gift subscription(s)
Provides a count of how many they are gifting (), and how much they have gifted in total ()

member.name: E:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient.OnGiftedSubNotice
member.summary: Invoked when a user is gifted a subscription

member.name: E:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient.OnSubscriptionNotice
member.summary: Invoked when a user (re)subscribes

member.name: E:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient.OnRaidNotice
member.summary: Invoked when a raid occurs

member.name: E:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient.OnPaidUpgradeNotice
member.summary:
Invoked when a user continues their gifted subscription
Note: and will equal to if the gifted subscription was from an anonymous gifter

member.name: E:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient.OnPrimeUpgradeNotice
member.summary: Invoked when a user converts their subscription plan from Prime to paid (Tier 1, 2 or 3)

member.name: E:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient.OnAnnouncement
member.summary: Invoked when a chat announcement is sent

member.name: E:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient.OnUserTimeout
member.summary: Invoked when a user gets timed out

member.name: E:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient.OnUserBan
member.summary: Invoked when a user gets banned

member.name: E:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient.OnChatClear
member.summary: Invoked when a chat gets cleared

member.name: E:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient.OnMessageDelete
member.summary: Invoked when a message gets deleted

member.name: E:MiniTwitch.Irc.IrcClient.OnChannelJoin
member.summary:
Invoked when a channel is joined

member.summary:
The OAuth token of the account

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Models.ClientOptions.SkipCommandProcessing
member.summary:
IRC commands to skip from being fully parsed and handled. Multiple values can be set with ''
Note: This can help with CPU and memory usage, but it will stop corresponding events from firing
Only use it if you know what you are doing!

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Models.ClientOptions.Anonymous
member.summary:
Whether to connect anonymously or not
Note: You will not be able to send messages if connect anonymously
Default is

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Models.ClientOptions.HideAuthenticationLogs
member.summary:
Whether to hide the sending of and from logging (if a logger through is provided)
Note: Setting this to is not a good idea
Default is

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Models.ClientOptions.Logger
member.summary:
Logging destination
Adding a logger is not required, but highly recommended

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Models.ClientOptions.JoinRateLimit
member.summary:
The amount of outgoing JOINs allowed in a 10 second time period
Default value is 20
Twitch docs:

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Models.ClientOptions.MessageRateLimit
member.summary:
The amount of outgoing PRIVMSGs allowed in a 30 second period
Default value is 20
Twitch docs:

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Models.ClientOptions.ModMessageRateLimit
member.summary:
The amount of outgoing PRIVMSGs in moderated channels allowed in a 30 second period
Default value is 100
Twitch docs:
Note: Adding to makes this obsolete

member.name: T:MiniTwitch.Irc.Models.MessageAuthor
member.summary: Represents an author of a message or a certain event

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Models.MessageAuthor.BadgeInfo
member.summary:
Contains metadata related to the chat badges in the badges tag
Currently, this tag contains metadata only for subscriber badges, to indicate the number of months the user has been a subscriber

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Models.MessageAuthor.Badges
member.summary:
Comma-separated list of chat badges in the form, <badge>/<version>. For example, admin/1. There are many possible badge values, but here are few:
admin
bits
broadcaster
moderator
subscriber
turbo
Most badges have only 1 version, but some badges like subscriber badges offer different versions of the badge depending on how long the user has subscribed
To get the badge, use the Get Global Chat Badges and Get Channel Chat Badges APIs. Match the badge to the set-id fields value in the response. Then, match the version to the id field in the list of versions

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Models.MessageAuthor.ColorCode
member.summary:
The color of the users name in the chat room. This is a hexadecimal RGB color code in the form, #RGB
Note: May be empty if it is never set

member.name: P:MiniTwitch.Irc.Models.MessageAuthor.DisplayName
member.summary:
The users display name, escaped as described in the IRCv3 spec
Note: Can contain characters outside [a-zA-Z0-9_]
